api_call:
package main

import (
	"fmt"
	"net/http"
	"io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

	url := "https://1forge.com/forex-quotes/quotes"

	req, _ := http.NewRequest("GET", url, nil)

	res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

	defer res.Body.Close()
	body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

	fmt.Println(res)
	fmt.Println(string(body))

}
api_description: Stock and Forex Data and Realtime Quotes

best_instruction.candidate: Desiring up-to-date financial information, I want to request quotes for all available symbols using the 1Forge Finance APIs. Can you guide me through this process?

api_call:
require 'uri'
require 'net/http'
require 'openssl'

url = URI("https://1forge.com/forex-quotes/quotes")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Get.new(url)

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body
api_description: Stock and Forex Data and Realtime Quotes

best_instruction.candidate: To stay updated with real-time financial market data, I want to request and receive quotes for all symbols using the powerful capabilities of 1Forge Finance APIs. Could you please guide me on how to do this effectively?

api_call:
<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, [
  CURLOPT_URL => "https://1forge.com/forex-quotes/quotes",
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "GET",
]);

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
  echo $response;
}
api_description: Stock and Forex Data and Realtime Quotes

best_instruction.candidate: I'd like to retrieve a list of symbols for which 1Forge Finance provides real-time quotes. How can I achieve that using the 1Forge Finance APIs?

api_call:
package main

import (
	"fmt"
	"net/http"
	"io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

	url := "https://1forge.com/forex-quotes/symbols"

	req, _ := http.NewRequest("GET", url, nil)

	res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

	defer res.Body.Close()
	body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

	fmt.Println(res)
	fmt.Println(string(body))

}

api_call:
require 'uri'
require 'net/http'
require 'openssl'

url = URI("https://1forge.com/forex-quotes/symbols")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Get.new(url)

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

api_call:
<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, [
  CURLOPT_URL => "https://1forge.com/forex-quotes/symbols",
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "GET",
]);

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
  echo $response;
}
